title: Strengthening Hospitality Practical Skills: Practice-Based Learning Community for Elementary Science Teachers' Professional Development

context.prior_knowledge: Basic science subject knowledge and classroom teaching experience
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Participating teachers can share science lesson cases with peers at least three times, incorporate feedback, and improve lesson designs.
Participating teachers can systematically archive and share materials generated during the implementation process (e.g., lesson plans, student outputs, reflective journals) on a digital platform.
Participating teachers can form and operate voluntary learning communities within schools by applying Communities of Practice theory.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
